Bloomington.WBNQ:
WBNQ (101.5 FM) is the most powerful FM radio station in McLean County, Illinois, United States, broadcasting on 101.5 MHz at 50,000 watts of effective radiated power. It has had a contemporary hit radio music format since 1975.


== History ==
WBNQ first signed on the air as WJBC-FM in the late 1940s.
